thread.section_title: Maine Lobster Now Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Maine Lobster Now | www.mainelobsternow.com
thread.title: Alex Grinshpan
thread.title_full: Maine Lobster Now reviewed by Alex Grinshpan

author: Alex Grinshpan
title: Alex Grinshpan
text: I ordered the cooked lobster meat and it was fantastic. It was fresh, a good mix of tails and claws, cooked well, not too watery or rubbery, and NO shell. It was just like my mom used to prepare, without the hours of cooking, shelling and cleaning it. I made lobster rolls for a function highlighting food from my home state, and I'm glad the Californians were able to taste some really delicious lobster rolls.
